title: Mimeograph, 1969-165-290, 1959
medium: Photomechanical reproduction, blueprint on white wove paper, graphite
signed: Imprinted, lower right below design: ALEXANDER GIRARD 2/4/59
inscribed: Imprinted upper margin: HALF FULL SIZE REPEAT / 24";  and at left below design: NOTE: / "SEEDS" ARE TO BE COLOR PRINTED / SERIES 715 "PUMPKIN SEEDS"; Verso: in graphite, upper left corner: XII-2
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
description: Object is a mimeograph of original drawing for the Design "Pumpkin Seeds" (OTL 6509.116.1999), with a blueprint of the design stapled to it
